item.title: Comcast beats earnings estimates as broadband revenue rises despite customer losses
item.description: Comcast topped Wall Street's fourth-quarter estimates on Thursday as revenue from the company's broadband business gave it a boost despite losing cust...

item.title: Oil giant Shell raises dividend despite full-year profit miss
item.description: British oil giant Shell on Thursday reported a significant drop in annual profit following a year of lower crude prices.

item.title: Deutsche Bank shares drop 5% after quarterly profit falls, cost target scrapped
item.description: Legal provisions weighed on the bottom line at Germany's largest lender Deutsche Bank, with net profit falling in the fourth quarter.

item.title: Shares of fashion giant H&M drop as fourth-quarter sales miss estimates
item.description: Shares of H&M dropped more than 5% on Thursday after the world's second-largest retailer missed sales forecasts in the fourth quarter.

item.title: Meta earnings reward investors who bid up shares to five straight record closes
item.description: Meta Platforms delivered a monster quarterly beat on everything from sales and earnings to cash flow and engagement.
